team_members.name: Elliot Warren
team_members.about: Elliot Warren is a graduate of San Francisco State University with a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science. He is enthusiastic about building passion projects that will improve daly life through automation. Through his service in the United States Air Force, he has refined his skills in self-discipline, team leadership, and situational adaptability, which he is now eager to apply to the tech industry. Elliot has led teams of between four to six individuals in learning-based coding projects throughout his time at San Francisco State University. Outside of his professional endeavors, Elliot enjoys building aquariums/aquascaping, playing video games, and experimenting with new recipes in the kitchen. He is driven by a relentless desire to make a positive impact in the world through technology, and continuously seeks out opportunities to learn and grow.

team_members.name: Inderpaul Bhander
team_members.about: Inderpaul Bhander is a senior at San Francisco State University, pursuing a Bachelors of Science in Computer Science.  With over 10 years of experience as a project manager and site supervisor in the construction industry, Inderpaul understands what it means to meet deadlines and learn on the job. Looking for a new challenge Inderpaul decided to study Computer Science and hopes to focus on the cybersecurity side of the tech industry.

team_members.name: Miguelangel Vargas
team_members.about: Miguelangel is a senior student at San Francisco State University and a retired Air Force veteran. His hobbies include video games, scuba diving, and exploring AI technologies.

team_members.name: Sukrit Dev Dhawan
team_members.about: Sukrit is an international student from India and a junior at SF State majoring in Computer Science. He is interested in low level programming and wants to learn about robotics. His hobbies include playing basketball, sketching, and trying to cook when he has time. He loves to keep learning about new things and takes on tasks that he thinks would challenge him.

team_members.name: Mohammed Deeb
team_members.about: Mohammed Deeb is our Git Master, Mohammed ensures our codebase remains organized and efficient through his expert management of version control.

team_members.name: Citlalin Galvan
team_members.about: Citlalin Galvan is a senior student at San Francisco State University working towards a bachelor's in Computer Science. Citlalin has 2.5 years of working in the semiconductor industry with power management devices. She has hands-on experience building and fixing PCBs and has developed automated testing programs for two different companies. Her academic interests include electrical engineering, cybersecurity, and ethnic studies. Outside her interests include archery, sewing, and swimming. She is always pursuing knowledge in new topics that interest her.

team_members.name: Naing Htet
team_members.about: Naing Htet, a junior at San Francisco State University, majoring in Computer Science. He is also a Cal Bridge Scholar with a keen interest in Artificial Intelligence involving Machine Learning and Deep Learning. Outside of his pursue of education, he watches anime and play games in his free time. He leads our front-end development.
